# Ignore Visual Studio files
.vs/
*.vscode/
*.suo
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.mdf
*.ldf

# Ignore build output
bin/
obj/

# Ignore NuGet packages
*.nupkg
*.paket/

# Ignore build artifacts
[Dd]ebug/
[Dd]ebugPublic/
[Rr]elease/
[Rr]eleases/
x64/
x86/
[Aa][Rr][Mm]/
[Aa][Rr][Mm]64/
bld/
[Bb]in/
[Oo]bj/
[Ll]og/
[Ll]ogs/

# Ignore Visual Studio generated files
_UpgradeReport_Files/
Backup*/
UpgradeLog*.XML
UpgradeLog*.htm

# Ignore Resharper cache
_ReSharper*/
*.resharper
*.resharper.user

# Ignore StyleCop files
.StyleCop

# Ignore Rider files
.idea/
*.sln.iml

# Ignore Rider's temporary files
.rider/

# Ignore Rider's .NET Core project model
projectmodel.cache

# Ignore build results of Rider's unit test runner
TestResults

# Ignore build results of Rider's command line build
artifacts/

# Ignore dotCover files
*.dotCover

# Ignore .NET Core
project.lock.json
project.fragment.lock.json
artifacts/
**/bin/
**/obj/
